column5: Must be a brand new outfitter. The only lodge in that area is Mahkwa, and some other small outfitter that has a couple remote cabins on the very back bay of Vaughn Lake.

There is a great website out there: https://CanadianLodges.com You can search for lodges in all provinces by what is important to you and your group. Can also search by lake name which will give all lodges located on or fishing that body of water. Enter Lac Seul in the "water body" box and you will see all lodges there with maps of their locations. Looking for a new or different lodge this year? Great place to start.
Anyone have a review about this resort? Looking to book something for later this summer with them and looking for advice.Thank you!
were is this place.Doesnt ring a bell with me.
Lac Seul...it's a big lake north of Vermilion Bay.
Duh.really.I know where it is.Fish it all the time. Just never heard of this place.
Ha. That reminds me of a scene from the movie Airplane. We have to get these people to a hospital. What is it? It's a big brick building where they keep sick people.
Its also tge big lake north of dryden and Sioux lookout

Add me to the list. Lac Seul is, also, east of Ear Falls. But I never heard of Lac Seul Adventures. Maybe when sanity returns to this thread, someone sober will chime in. How many more weeks of covid-19 ?? Sounds like liquor rationing needs to be considered, atleast by some WC members.
I know where lac Seul adventures is, it's in johns prov 1800 I'm sure that's always a great adventure lol,rod
Approximate Location of Lac Seul Adventures is near the mouth of the channel to Vaughn Lake. Picture attached.
